::Stratus::

Stratus slows down, his scanners reporting that Abominus wasn't keeping up too well. He looks back to make sure he was going slow enough now, approaching the ship slowly.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Through the murkiness of the ocean lies a technological weapon. Easily
> out of place in this aquatic world, it will soon not be. Through the
> sandy water of the deep ocean, Abominus tilts his head. He understood
> the following command, but then his name was reused. The robot clenches
> his fists, then relises them many times in hesitations, then begins to
> plod once more forward, continuesly growling the whole way.
> "Grrrr.....grr.......ff....follow.....grrrr."
